alert.note: Alert for Deaf Smith (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 4:09PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Deaf Smith County through 445 PM CDT... At 409 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles east of Bellview, or 21 miles northwest of Friona, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glenrio. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
